task.name: t.vect.db.select
task.description: Prints attributes of vector maps registered in a space time vector dataset.
task.keywords: temporal, attribute table, vector, database, select, time

parameter.name: input
parameter.description: Name of the input space time vector dataset

parameter.name: separator
parameter.label: Field separator character between the output columns
parameter.description: Special characters: pipe, comma, space, tab, newline

parameter.name: layer
parameter.label: Layer number or name
parameter.description: Vector features can have category values in different layers. This number determines which layer to use. When used with direct OGR access this is the layer name.

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword

parameter.name: t_where
parameter.label: WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword used in the temporal GIS framework
